description: Satellites must be registered as a spacecraft with Azure Orbital to establish contacts with the satellite.

commands.name: az orbital spacecraft create
commands.syntax:
az orbital spacecraft create --name
                             --resource-group
                             [--links]
                             [--location]
                             [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                             [--norad-id]
                             [--tags]
                             [--title-line]
                             [--tle-line1]
                             [--tle-line2]

commands.name: az orbital spacecraft delete
commands.syntax:
az orbital spacecraft delete [--ids]
                             [--name]
                             [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                             [--resource-group]
                             [--subscription]
                             [--yes]

commands.name: az orbital spacecraft list-available-contact
commands.summary: List available contacts. A contact is available if the spacecraft is visible from the ground station for more than the minimum viable contact duration provided in the contact profile.
commands.syntax:
az orbital spacecraft list-available-contact --contact-profile
                                             --end-time
                                             --ground-station-name
                                             --resource-group
                                             --spacecraft-name
                                             --start-time
                                             [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]

commands.name: az orbital spacecraft show
commands.summary: Get the specified spacecraft in a specified resource group.

commands.name: az orbital spacecraft update
commands.syntax:
az orbital spacecraft update [--add]
                             [--force-string {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                             [--ids]
                             [--location]
                             [--name]
                             [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                             [--norad-id]
                             [--remove]
                             [--resource-group]
                             [--set]
                             [--subscription]
                             [--tags]
                             [--title-line]
                             [--tle-line1]
                             [--tle-line2]

commands.name: az orbital spacecraft wait
commands.summary: Place the CLI in a waiting state until a condition is met.
